A13: Paco Reconti

A14: Marzio Honorato

Q1: What is the title of the Kannada-language film released in 1980?
A1: Pattanakke Banda Pathniyaru (transl. Wives arrived in the city)

Q2: Who directed the film Pattanakke Banda Pathniyaru?
A2: A. V. Sheshagiri Rao

A3: S. D. Ankalagi, B. H. Chandannanawar, M. G. Hublikar and Surendra Ingle

Q4: Who are the lead actors in the film Pattanakke Banda Pathniyaru?
A4: Srinath, Manjula, Lokesh and Padmapriya

Q5: Who composed the music for the film Pattanakke Banda Pathniyaru?
A5: M. Ranga Rao

Q6: Was the film Pattanakke Banda Pathniyaru remade in any other language?
A6: Yes, it was remade in Telugu as Patnam Vachina Pativrathalu (1982) and in Tamil as Pattanamthaan Pogalaamadi (1990).

Q7: How many songs were retained in the Telugu version of the film?
A7: One song, Shankara Gangadhara, was retained in the Telugu version.

Q8: Can you name any of the other films that were remade from Pattanakke Banda Pathniyaru?
A8: Yes, it was remade in Telugu as Patnam Vachina Pativrathalu (1982) and in Tamil as Pattanamthaan Pogalaamadi (1990).

Q9: What is the name of the director who remade the film in Tamil?
A9: The film was remade in Tamil by director K. Vishwanath.

Q10: How many years passed between the original release of Pattanakke Banda Pathniyaru and its remake in Tamil?
A10: It took 10 years for the film to be remade in Tamil, as it was released in 1980 and the Tamil remake was released in 1990.
